thread.title: In pictures: Miniature worlds - BBC News
thread.title_full: In pictures: Miniature worlds - BBC News

title: In pictures: Miniature worlds - BBC News
text:
Read more about sharing. Close share panel 
From Sydney and Los Angeles to Hong Kong, artist Joshua Smith's small models depict the buildings of big cities. Everything in them is reduced to scale, down to worn posters and discarded cigarette stubs. Image copyright Joshua Smith Image copyright Joshua Smith Image copyright Joshua Smith 
This model is based on a building found on Willow Street, in the Tenderloin neighbourhood of San Francisco. Image copyright Joshua Smith Image copyright Andrew Beveridge/asbCreative.comm 
This shipping container was originally located in Haymarket in Sydney, before Smith shrunk it down to size. Image copyright Joshua Smith Image copyright Joshua Smith 
This building is also based on one found in Sydney's Chinatown, and contains LED lights to keep it illuminated at night. Smith has even recreated the bin bags left on the street. Image copyright Joshua Smith Image copyright Joshua Smith Image copyright Joshua Smith 
Smith's work features in New Realities, a group show that runs until 25 March 2017 at the Muriel Guepin Gallery in New York.
